name: Elementor Stripe Payment
author: Payment Addons, support@payaddons.com

sections.description:
Elementor Stripe Payment addons is a payment solution to build your payment page or form with elementor. It’s the easiest way to create any one-time or recurring order form, payment form, or subscription event with all kinds payment methods like Credit Cards, PayPal, Google Pay, ApplePay, Afterpay, Affirm, ACH, Klarna, iDEAL, and more.

With stripe payment addons for elementor, you can create custom payment forms and accept payments directly on your website using Stripe. Whether you’re selling products, services, or accepting donations, Payment Addons for Elementor makes it easy to get paid.

Features

🛠️ Elementor widgets: Checkout button, Confirmation summary, Pricing Table. Docs

🔌 Elementor form integration: natively supports the Elementor Form widget, including credit card field, payment element field, decimal type field, which means that features such as reCAPTCHA, Multi Steps, Email Action, and more are all included. Docs

💳 Payment methods: Visa, MasterCard, Alipay, WeChat, Apple Pay, Google Pay, Microsoft Pay, Bancontact, FPX, EPS, SEPA, Giropay, Sofort, iDeal, and more.

🎁 Elementor Templates: Built-in payment Elementor templates that can help you get started in no time.

⏰ Payment way: One-time pay & recurring & recurring occurrences times.

🌎 Multi currency: Supports all popular currencies.

📧 Email Notification: Allows you to send a notification email to customer with payment detail.

🎁 PayPal (Only Stripe Account In Europe): PayPal will be available as a payment method for payment element form, allowing customers globally to make payments using their PayPal accounts. However, please note that only Stripe accounts based in Europe support this feature, as per the limits outlined in the documentation

🔔 Payment scenarios: Billing plan with monthly, yearly, Donation Form Custom Amount, Order form, etc.

Getting started with Elementor pay addons is easy. Simply install the plugin, connect your Stripe account, and start creating payment forms. You can add payment forms to any page or post using the Payment Form widget in Elementor.

Payment Widgets

  • Checkout Button (FREE): Redirect your customer to a stripe-hosting checkout page.
  • Confirmation Summary (FREE): Create your Thank You page after a successful purchase redirect with payment details.
  • Price Table (FREE): Create your price table with checkout action including recurring/subscription.
  • Checkout Redirect Form (Pro): The most secure form checkout which will redirect to the secure stripe-hosting checkout page, support multi payment methods, one-time, recurring pay, coupon, tax, etc.
  • Checkout Credit Card Form (Pro): Create a flexable elementor form that includes a credit card field with one-time & recurring support.
  • Checkout Payment Element Form 🎉 (Pro): Create a flexable elementor form that includes multiple payment methods with one-time & recurring support.

ABOUT US

We provide professional Stripe payment solutions for WordPress, with the following core products:

  • Elementor Stripe Payment
    Seamlessly integrate customized Stripe-powered payment forms into your Elementor site. Sell products, services, accept donations, and more through intuitive checkout experiences. Elementor Stripe Payment

  • WooCommerce Stripe Payment
    WooCommerce Stripe addon is a payment gateway for WooCommerce. With just a single configuration, unlock access to over 30 secure and globally recognized payment methods, including Credit Cards, Google Pay, ApplePay, WeChat Pay, Alipay, Afterpay, ACH, Klarna, iDEAL, FPX, Grabpay, OXXO, Multibanco, Bancontact, EPS, P24, Giropay, Affirm, and more. WooCommerce Stripe Payment

  • Stripe Express Payment
    Embed standalone variety of built-in stripe payment widgets, forms anywhere on your site using easy shortcodes, No store required to collect instant payments. Stripe Express

feat: add stripe price id for elementor form.

fix: subscription fix

1.0.0

First Release
sections.faq:
Is Elementor Pro required to use your plugin?

No, Elementor Pro is not required to use our plugin. However, some premium features, such as payment forms based on Elementor forms, do require Elementor Pro.

Does this plugin only support stripe gateway? What about PayPal?

Currently, our plugin only supports Stripe as a payment gateway. However, we are constantly evaluating new features and payment gateways to add to our plugin. We understand that PayPal is a popular payment gateway and we may consider adding support for it in the future.

Does this support recurring payments, like for subscriptions?

Yes, you can feel free to provide any subscription.

Does this support to integrate with Elementor Form?

Yes, but limitted to premium version only.

Does this require an SSL certificate?

Yes! In Live Mode, an SSL certificate must be installed on your site to use Stripe.

Does this support both production mode and sandbox mode for testing?

Yes, it does – You can switch them in plugin setting page.

Can I disable WP REST API?

No, this plugin is using WP REST API. So please make sure it is opening or just add stripe-express API into the whitelist by some plugins like disable-json-api.

sections.reviews:
Thanks Guys

By barrera on March 21, 2024

I just wanted to share how impressed I am with this plugin's support staff, particularly Troy. He was incredibly easy to approach and tirelessly went through multiple tests to find a solution to our Google Pay issue. Thanks to his dedication, we are now happily enjoying the convenience of this plugin on our website easymoveservices.com.au. Five stars all the way!

Excellent Plugin and support

By amineleblaugrana on January 10, 2024

I was losing hope of finding a plugin that allows to add a credit card field to the elementor form and then I found this one.
This plugin works perfectly and has a lot of features now since it is always evolving.
I would also like to thank the support which is attentive and very responsive.

Brilliant plugin and support

By iallen on January 5, 2024

This plugin is the perfect addition to add a payment option to your Elementor forms. Lightweight and easy to use and it meant I didn't have to change a whole process as I could add to existing forms on the website. I had teething issues with the integration but Troy was super responsive and very helpful to get to the bottom of the issue so that it was working perfectly. Highly recommended. Thanks Troy for your support!

Awesome plugin & support

By troyyang on July 11, 2023

This plugin does exactly what we need while design our pricing table with stripe recurring integration. Needed a little help and support was friendly and fast.
